column42: As previously reported orally to colleagues in MHCLG, we work with our Finance colleagues (FSSD) to obtain  these figures, and ongoing reconciliation work is undertaken in order to reflect accurate actual payments. Occasionally these reconciliations are resolved after our monthly reporting. We are working to try to ensure that these are dealt with in the most timely manner. Over the course of the year these minor variations will even out.
